body.name: hello Sweet Coconut Deodorant With Shea Butter for Women + Men, Aluminum Free, Baking Soda Free, Parabens Free, 24 Hour Odor Protection, 2.6 Ounce, 2 Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 23 mins
features: Contains 2 naturally friendly sweet coconut deodorants - clinically proven 24-hour odor protection with shea butter to soothe and moisturize. featuring a gender neutral, trend driven, thoughtfully created formula. apply to your underarms only. take a whiff. smile. you got this.

aluminum-free, formulated not to stain: block odor, not sweat with hello aluminum-free deodorants. aluminum, the cause of stains, is added to some deodorants to prevent sweating.hello aluminum-free deodorants provide all day friendliness to fight stinky without staining, anything less would be the pits

naturally friendly deodorant: goodbye stinky, hello naturally friendly deodorant. no baking soda, no parabens, no talcs, no dyes. all hello products are cruelty-free, vegan, and free from dyes, artificial fragrances, parabens, and gluten. #choosefriendly

non-sticky, non-greasy, glides easily: thoughtfully crafted with a base of natural oils and waxes including tea tree oil, arrowroot, rice bran wax, shea butter and cocoa butter to glide on easily, soothe, and moisturize for super-amaze skin feel.
made from 100% recycled packaging material: hello planet, let’s be friends. made from 100% previously recycled packaging and 100% recyclable all over again.
body.description: Say hello to sweet coconut deodorant with natural fragrance. Thoughtfully created in 100% previously recycled packaging, this lively deo smells great and provides all day friendliness to fight the stink, soothe and moisturize. Anything less would be the pits. But buckle-up, there's more goodness: this deodorant is aluminum free, baking soda free, parabens free, phthalates free, talc free, and dyes free. As if that weren't enough magic, hello is vegan, cruelty free, never tested on animals (Leaping Bunny Certified and PETA recognized). Choose friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing deodorant. It helped with my under arm hair bumbs
reviews.reviewText: Hello Sweet Coconut Deodorant with Shea Butter is a game-changer in the deodorant department. The tropical scent is delightful, and the addition of shea butter gives it a smooth, moisturizing feel. It effectively keeps odor at bay throughout the day, making it a reliable choice for daily use. The application is easy, and the formula doesn't leave a sticky residue. If you're on the hunt for a reliable, pleasant-smelling deodorant with a touch of hydration, Hello Sweet Coconut Deodorant won't disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells nice but not too strong of scent, lasts all day
reviews.reviewText: I break out easily with other deodorants/antiperspirants. This has a nice scent that's not very strong. Not the smoothest gliding on when applying it but it works well and lasts all day. No breakouts from it either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s very sugary-sweet smelling, like cake. Don’t get this if you want a light, low profile coconut deodorant, it’s closer to perfume.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smell is not bad but the feeling when applied is just disgusting
reviews.reviewText: Is a good brand and all but really the sensation when applying is just so bad plus it feels so hard to apply in your body. The smell is not really strong either. It does hold your body smell, which is really good if that is what you are looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you like coconut these are great. Very strong scent. They can be a little rough when you put them on, they don't glide in your armpits like some other deodorants, but they do the job and make you less sweaty!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not the best
reviews.reviewText: I love coconut deodorants but this one failed me the most. It doesn’t last long and as soon as I start sweating my armpits starts to smell. I tried it on my husband thinking it was just me. But unfortunately it didn’t work on him either. It’s good if you don sweat and stink a lot. I use it if I know I’m not sweating but to workout or just to go out, it’s a no for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite non-tox deodorant
reviews.reviewText: I have been using non-tox products for nearly 5 years and I swear this one is my favorite one. It smells great and actually lasts all day. I do apply morning and night, doesn't last 24 hours. But I'm totally fine doing that if I don't have to apply multiple times throughout the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Works good BUT
reviews.reviewText: It leaves white marks on clothes and seeps through a faint white on black clothes. As for the texture it didn't bother me at all. The rest of the reviews made it sound really gross. I wish it was a little bit stronger, it only keeps you fresh for so long and I've never had issues with normal depderant
